mapper.update:

user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
incr_grow_up_count = #{incrGrowUpCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update plant_farmer_energy set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, incr_grow_up_count = #{incrGrowUpCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, incr_way = #{incrWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select from plant_farmer_energy where id = #{id} and user_id = #{userId}
